name: Chairman Greg Cox Gives 2020 State of the County Address
description: County Board of Supervisors Chairman Greg Cox delivered the 2020 State of the County Address aboard the USS Midway Wednesday.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
County Board of Supervisors Chairman Greg Cox delivered the 2020 State of the County Address aboard the USS Midway Wednesday. In his final State of the County address, he mentioned how far the County has come since he first joined the Board of Supervisors 25 years ago.
Despite many achievements over the years, the County faces additional challenges. Chairman Cox announced new initiatives in several areas.
Plans include expanding mental health, and drug and alcohol abuse programs, more housing for homeless youth, helping foster children succeed academically and offering young people more opportunities to get involved in County government.
Watch the entire address above.
